      • getCategories

        public static Category[] getCategories(java.lang.String categoryGroup)
        Rest service consuming the Category API.
        Parameters:
        categoryGroup - "Top 5" to get the 5 most relevant categories, "Grid" to get the rest of the categories (case-sensitive)
        Returns:
        an array of categories in accordance to the parameter passed. null if parameter doesn't coincide.

      • getValidCoupons

        public static Coupon[] getValidCoupons()
        Rest service consuming the Coupon API.
        Returns:
        array of non expired coupons
